text: The report, ‘ICHR invites RSS historian for lecture’ (March 25, 2016), erroneously said that Satish Chandra Mittal and Dinanath Batra were among the petitioners who demanded a ban on Wendy Doniger’s book – “The Hindus: An Alternative History”. In fact, they had filed civil and criminal petitions invoking Section 91 of the Civil Procedure Code, and Section 499 and 295A of the Indian Penal Code (IPC). The book’s Indian publishers, Penguin, in an out-of-court settlement, decided to pulp the book. — Readers’ Editor
title: Correction
